TOOLTIP EXTENSION A PURE CSS SOLUTION

👋 Welcome to Tooltip Extension Documentation 👋

Tooltip Extensions is a lightweight, pure CSS library that makes it easy to add stylish, customizable tooltips to any HTML element. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced developer, this documentation will guide you in maximizing the potential of Tooltip Extensions.

Why Tooltip Extensions?

  • 📌 Easy to implement with no JavaScript required.
  • 🎨 Works seamlessly with nearly all CSS libaries.
  • ⚙️ Offers versatile positioning options and built-in styling for MudBlazor with fallback defaults.

Show your support by giving us a star 🌟 on GitHub and sharing with your network!

Tooltip Extensions is inspired by and modeled from Bulma CSS Tooltip Extensions. It is designed to blend beautifully with Bulma and MudBlazor styles, all while staying flexible and lightweight. It will work without any dependencies whatsoever!

Tooltip Extension by Versile. The source code is licensed MIT. The website content is licensed CC BY NC SA 4.0.
